PRESENTATION: ğŸ‘‹ğŸ» Hello {name}! @LibreGroupHelpBot is the free, open source and privacy respecting Bot alternative to Group Help to better manage your groups! ğŸ‘‰ğŸ»Add me in a supergroup and set me as an Administrator to get me right into the action! â“ What are the commands? SETTINGS_WHERE_OPEN: Where do you want to open the settings menu?
SETTINGS_SELECT: Select one of the settings you want edit.

MEDIA_INCORRECT: âš ï¸ Media was not parsed properly. Try again.
PARSING_ERROR: âš ï¸ Message was not parsed properly. Try again.

WELCOME_SETTING: ğŸ’¬ Welcome Message From here you can set a welcome message sent when someone join the group.
MODE_IMAGE_ONLY: Currently image mode is the only mode avaiable
IMAGE_DESCRIPTION: Write the characters drawn in a image
W_SEND_EVERYTIME: Send the welcome message at every join of users in the group
W_SEND_ONCE: Send the welcome message only at the first join of the user in the group
CAPTCHA_SEND_EVERYTIME: Ask to complete the captcha at every join of any user in the group
CAPTCHA_SEND_ONCE: Ask to complete the captcha only at first join of the user in the group
ANTIFLOOD_DESCRIPTION:
From here you can set a punishment for those who send many messages in a short time.

Currently the antiflood is activated when {messages} messages are sent within {seconds} seconds.
ANTIFLOOD_PUNISHMENT: AntiFlood, user sent more than {number} messages in {time} seconds
FORWARD_PUNISHMENT: AntiSpam, user forwarded a message from an unallowed {type}
QUOTE_PUNISHMENT: AntiSpam, user quoted a message from an unallowed {type}
TGLINK_PUNISHMENT: AntiSpam, user sent an unallowed telegram link
LINK_PUNISHMENT: AntiSpam, user sent an unallowed link
CAPTCHA_PUNISHMENT: Captcha, user failed to solve the captcha
ANTISPAM_TGLINKS_DESCRIPTION: ğŸ“˜ Telegram links From this menu you can set a punishment for users who send messages containing Telegram links. ğŸ¯ Username Antispam: this option triggers the antispam when a username considered spam is sent. Bots Antispam: this option triggers the antispam when a Bot link is sent. Punishment: {punishment} Deletion: {deletion}
ANTISPAM_LINKS_DESCRIPTION: ğŸ”— TOTAL LINKS BLOCK Choose the punishment for those who sends any kind of link. Punishment: {punishment} Deletion: {deletion}
ANTISPAM_FORWARD_DESCRITPION: ğŸ“© Forwarding Select punishment for users who forward messages in the group. Forward from groups option blocks messages written by an anonymous administrator of another group and forwarded to this group.
ANTISPAM_QUOTES_DESCRITPION: ğŸ’­ Quote Select punishment for users who send messages containing quotes from external chats.
CHAT_BASED_PERMS: ğŸ“£ Forwards from channels â”” {channels} ğŸ‘¥ Groups â”” {groups} ğŸ‘¤ Users â”” {users} ğŸ¤– Bots â”” {bots}
ANTISPAM_EXC: Antispam Exception Manage the Telegram's links/usernames of groups and channels that will not be treated as spam. The group links are automatically in the antispam exception.
TELEGRAM_EXC_ADD: Now send one or more links or @username of channels/groups to add them to the Whitelist. ğŸ‘¤ To add a user to the whitelist you have to make him /free with the appropriate command, not here ğŸ‘‰ğŸ» Send a link/username each line (without any other symbols or characters) or forward a message here from the channel you wish to add to the Whitelist. Example: @LibreGroupHelp https://t.me/+Qd8G9lyj5vVkYmU0
TELEGRAM_EXC_DELETE: Now send one or more links or @username of channels/groups to remove them from the Whitelist. Send a link/username each line (without any other symbols or characters) or forward a message here from the channel you wish to remove from the Whitelist. Example: @LibreGroupHelp https://t.me/+Qd8G9lyj5vVkYmU0
ANTISPAM_LINKS_EXC: Block Links Exceptions Set up the links or part of them that will be ignored from the total links block check.
LINKS_EXC_ADD: Now send one or more links (or even part of them) you want to add to the Links Block Whitelist. Send a single link in every line, without other chars. (Advanced) Links with a path will be counted as unique (ex. link.com/anypath will allow only this exact link path) Subdomains is counted, web.telegram.org won't include www.telegram.org, telegram.org only will include both Example: Github.com https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ Instagram.com
LINKS_EXC_DELETE: Now send one or more links (or even part of them) you want to remove from the Links Block Whitelist. Send a single link in every line, without other chars. (Advanced) Links with a path will be counted as unique (ex. link.com/anypath will allow only this exact link path) Subdomains is counted, web.telegram.org won't include www.telegram.org, telegram.org only will include both Example: Github.com Instagram.com Google.com

NOT_YOUR_CAPTCHA: âš ï¸ This is not your captcha!
CAPTCHA_TIME_TITLE: Send now the time limit that an user has to complete the captcha, otherwise he will be punished with the selected punishment ({punishment})

PROMOTED_DESCRIPTION: Use buttons below to change admin permissions
TITLE_CHANGED_TO: admin title has been changed to
SEND_NEW_TITLE: Send now the new title to assign
ALREADY_IN_ROLE: âš ï¸ User already has this role.
NOT_IN_ROLE: âš ï¸ User doesn't have this role.
TOO_LOW_LEVEL_SET_ROLE: âš ï¸ You haven't permission to set this role, it's higher level than your
TOO_LOW_LEVEL_SET_USER: âš ï¸ You can't change permissions to this user because he is higher level than you
INVALID_TARGET: âš ï¸ Invalid target, please reply to an user message or enter a username, if known will be used
INVALID_DELETE_TARGET: âš ï¸ Invalid delete target, please reply to a message to delete it
INVALID_TITLE:
âš ï¸ Invalid title, reply to an user with "/title customName" or identifier "/title @username customName"

Maximum 16 characters, emoji not allowed
Use /untitle to remove a title to an user
USELESS_ROLE: âš ï¸ You can't set this role because user already has all it's permissions
USER_IS_IMMUNE: âš ï¸ This user is immune and can't be punished, use /perms to see user permissions
MISSING_ROLE_PERM: âš ï¸ You haven't permission to set roles
UNKNOWN_ERROR: âš ï¸ An unknown error occurred, contact the bot owner to fix
USER_IS_ADMIN: âš ï¸ User is administrator of the group, use /reload if you think otherwise
USER_NOT_MEMBER: âš ï¸ User is not a member of the group
USER_NEVER_BEEN_MEMBER: âš ï¸ User has never been in the group
USER_NOT_ADMIN: âš ï¸ User is not an administrator of the group
ADMIN_TITLE_EMOJI_FOUND: âš ï¸ Admin title cannot have emoji
USER_NO_MORE_ADMIN: âš ï¸ User is no more administrator
PERM_ACTIVE_BY_DEFAULT: âš ï¸ You can't disable this permission beacause it's enabled by default for every group user
MISSING_ADMIN_PERMISSION: âš ï¸ You don't have this permission so you can't give it to other users, if you think otherwise use /reload
CANT_CHANGE_YOUR_PERMS: âš ï¸ You can't change permissions on yourself
MISSING_RIGHTS: âš ï¸ I haven't enough rights to perform this action, if you are trying to promote an user i can't do that if another admin did it first
OWNER_ONLY_TITLE: âš ï¸ Owner title can be changed only by him on telegram settings
MISSING_RIGHT_OR_ALREADY_PROMOTED: âš ï¸ I haven't enough permissions to promote this user, maybe has been already been promoted by another admin
CANT_SELF_PROMOTE: âš ï¸ I can't change permissions to myself
CANT_DELETE: âš ï¸ I can't delete messages
CANT_PIN: âš ï¸ I can't pin messages
CANT_PROMOTE: âš ï¸ I can't promote admins
CANT_INVITE: âš ï¸ I can't invite members
START_BOT_FIRST: âš ï¸ You need to /start me in private chat first to use this command
BUTTON_TOO_OLD: âš ï¸ This button is too old, you can't use that
MISSING_EXCEPTION: âš ï¸ This exception does not exhist
INVALID_EXCEPTIONS: âš ï¸ Invalid exceptions, please retry with a different formatting
TOO_MANY_EXCEPTIONS: âš ï¸ Too many exceptions! please remove some to add new exceptions
NOT_VALID_LINK: âš ï¸ This is  not a valid link
NOT_IMPLEMENTED: Currently this function is not implemented
CMDDESC_RULES:
/{name} or /regulation
Send group regulament message, it can be changed in settings
CMDDESC_PERMS:
/{name} or /permissions
Show permissions of an user in your group
CMDDESC_STAFF:
/{name} or /staffers
Show the list of staffers on group
CMDDESC_INFO:
/{name} or /informations
Show info about an user on group
CMDDESC_PIN:
/{name} or /hang
Pin a message on group with or without notification
CMDDESC_LINK:
/{name}
Sends to user the group link
NAME: Name
CONFIRM_FORGOT:
Are you sure to forgot {user} data?
User will be kicked all his tracks will be cleared from your group data on my database, this action is irreversible
SUCCESSFULL_FORGOT:
User forgot successfully!

Please note: if user rejoin the group new data about him will be stored again
Note also that i removed data of this user only from this group data, user data on other groups isn't affected
I didn't cleared any user data from telegram servers!
ADV_REPORT_ISSUE: If you think it is an error please report it to https://github.com/Sp3rick/GroupHelp/issues
